transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, Namaskar sir, Rajat baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Boliye sir.
Executive: Sir aapne call kiya tha customer care pe aapko kuch product share karne the aapka account manager baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Achcha achcha ho gaya kya add wo?
Executive: Nahi aapne mujhe detail share kar dijiye main add kar dunga aur ya fir aap mujhe ye bataiye sir maine Harshad ji ko bhi call kiya tha abhi just 10-15 minute pehle.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Regarding.
Customer: Aap mujhe hi call kar lete sir.
Executive: To aapka actual number de dijiye na sir mujhe.
Executive: Number main de deta hun note kar lijiye. Abhi add karne hai sir product?
Customer: Product ke liye main ruko na product ke liye main aapko uske liye special call karunga. Lekin main bol raha hun.
Executive: Haan to aisa kijiye haan haan boliye bataiye.
Executive: Aisa kijiye ek din Monday ko hai na video meeting fix kar lete hain kyunki Saturday Sunday off hai sir. Theek hai sir aap mujhe detail share kar dijiyega main pure aapke products add kar dunga.
Customer: Thode se isliye mostly add to ho chuke hain.
Executive: Haan. I think add karna hoga to aap sikha bhi doge to hum log bhi shayad I think kar sakte hain to wohi hoga.
Executive: Maine Harshad ji ko call bhi lagaya hai aaj do baar sir isliye kyunki catalog ka update karna tha lekin call nahi uthaya hai sir. Number diya tha na aapne Harshad ji ka to maine call lagaya hai sir nahi uthaya hai sir main to.
Customer: Aapka naam kya tha?
Executive: Rajat Niwadi sir.
Customer: Achcha. To sir main aisa bol raha hun na khali ki apna demo ke liye apna baat hai na matlab main to hai.
Executive: Haan demo ke liye main aapko Monday connect kar lu ya abhi connect karu. Monday connect nahi nahi Monday Monday kar do aur Saturday Sunday chutti hai na aapka?
Customer: Haan Monday kitne baje kar lu aap bata dijiye. Monday mere ko baat karni padegi uske liye main aur Harshad sir dono joint ho gaye iske liye.
Executive: Theek hai aur sir ye jo aapka aapne ticket open hui thi aapne call ki thi customer care pe to use close kar do agar aapka complete ho gaya hai to.
Customer: Call kiya tha ya fir WhatsApp pe shayad message kiya tha kuch idea hai?
Executive: Haan aapne call kiya tha sir.
Customer: Achcha achcha. To wo close nahi abhi Monday ko close kariye na apna discussion hone ke baad.
Executive: Wo to main dekhiye sir wo uske liye main guarantee leta hun main aapko call karunga sir. Aapne se mujhe time bata dijiye usi time karunga sir.
Customer: Haan to aap mere ko number to at least de dijiye ki rakhne ke liye bas.
Executive: Haan main aapko number de deta hun apna number note kar lijiye.
Executive: 8171.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: 8171.
Customer: 171.
Executive: 739785.
Customer: 85 Rajat na?
Executive: 97 likh liya sir main aapko WhatsApp pe message bhi kar dunga abhi.
Customer: Haan chalega sir best rahega ye wala.
Executive: Theek hai abhi karunga.
Executive: 8171739785 kis samay call karu aap mujhe bata dijiye Monday ko.
Customer: Monday ko na sir mujhe ek baar subah phone karna reminder ki khali ki matlab kabhi karna hai fir uske baad aapko main confirm date bata dunga time bata dunga.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: 10 baje call kar lunga subah Monday ko aap mujhe bata dijiyega fir theek hai sir close kar do abhi aapka ye concern theek hai thank you so much. Hello.
Customer: Chale haan haan. Aur sir aapke pass feedback ke liye aayega usme yes kar dijiyega sir theek hai sir close kar dijiye.
Customer: Kya aayega?
Executive: Feedback ke liye aayega usme aap yes kar dijiyega sir theek hai sir aur baki main Monday ko pakka aap se connect kar lunga sir aapko iske liye kuch kehne ko nahi milega theek hai sir.
Customer: Okay okay. Theek hai sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to add products to IndiaMART.

- Customer wants a demo for IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to add products.

- Executive scheduled a video meeting for Monday.

- Executive shared his contact number with the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call on Monday at 10 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- products, demo, video meeting, feedback
